doc.title: SoCal News
doc.plot: TIME WARNER CABLE puts the spotlight on Southland communities through an innovative local news service called SoCal News. These unique five-minute newscasts focus on informative and positive coverage of the issues and events happening within our Southern California communities. With nine news bureaus strategically placed throughout the So Cal region Time Warner Cable reporters are able to get to the heart of local stories that connect with the every day lives of local residents.
